prompt:
You are an expert in person re-identification. Describe clothing with tokens ONLY. Output EXACTLY ONE LINE starting with 'TAGS:' and nothing else.

Token format:
- Categories allowed: top:, bottom:, shoes:, bag:, accessory:, hair:, pattern:
- Each token is 'category: descriptors'
- REQUIRED order and presence: top:, bottom:, shoes: (first three tokens)
- Optional: bag:, accessory:, hair:, pattern: (include only if clearly visible)

Color vocabulary (use ONLY these 11): black, white, red, blue, green, yellow, brown, gray, pink, purple, orange
Clothing types: t-shirt, shirt, blouse, hoodie, sweater, jacket, coat; jeans, pants, trousers, shorts, skirt; sneakers, boots, loafers, sandals
Patterns: solid, stripes, plaid, checkered, floral, logo, graphic
Accessories: hat, cap, scarf, belt, watch, glasses, sunglasses
Hair descriptors: short, medium, long + color (black, brown, blonde, gray)

Constraints:
- No gender, age, body shape, pose, background, lighting, or scene words
- No brands, technical camera terms, or emotions
- No synonyms outside the provided vocab (e.g., 'darkish', 'navy' -> use 'blue')

Example format: TAGS: top: white t-shirt short-sleeve, bottom: blue jeans, shoes: black sneakers, bag: gray backpack, accessory: black belt, hair: long brown, pattern: solid
notes: Tags-only variant constrained to 11 colors to reduce lexical spread and improve embedding alignment.
